title: Did the U.S. Republic pay tribute to Okasio Cortez and Ilhan Omar for their destruction, Notre Dame?
subtitle: The newly elected members of the United States House of Representatives are frequent targets of party deception.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The American Congresswomen of Alexandria, Ocacio-Cortiz and Elhan Omar commended the destruction of the Notre Dame Cathedral in a fire that broke out in April 2019.
